name: Gosev
description: Tart ale with notes of lemon, lime, sea salt and coriander. Lightly conditioned on Raspberries.

name: Elias
description: Smooth, subtle citrus notes and floral aroma.

name: Glyphs
description: Tangerine, orange zest, and aromatic pine.

name: Stark
description: Rich maltiness with caramel and toast. Spice with floral aroma.

name: Grandar
description: Crackery sweetness balanced with hops, floral and herbal notes that finish with a subtle citrus. Step mashed and hopped with nobles.

name: Tribute
description: Orange, tangerine, basil, earthly. Citrus and sunflower aroma. Dry hopped with this year's Ales for ALS hop blend. $2 donated to "Ales for ALS" per 4-Pack.

name: Taup≈ç
description: Tropical passion fruit, red grapefruit, and zested orange.

name: Tides
description: Mango, passionfruit, lime zest, citrus, and blueberry.

name: Hurron
description: Enhanced with thiol-enriched Motueka from Freestyle Hops x Phantasm. Peach, pineapple and white grape.

name: Rubico
description: Pineapple, peach rings, bubblegum, strawberry and citrus.

name: Waves
description: Stonefruit and citrus, juicy finish. Blueberry and melon aroma.
